meanings.definition: To mark or sign with initials.
meanings.sent1: She initialed the document to show it was hers.
meanings.sent2: He always initialed his artwork before displaying it.
meanings.sent3: The cat initialed the freshly poured cement with its paw prints.
meanings.sent4: The rain initialed the sandy beach with its gentle touch.
meanings.sent5: The teacher initialed each student's homework to confirm completion.

meanings.sent1: The initialed handkerchief belonged to her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The initialed luggage was easily recognizable at the airport.
meanings.sent3: The initialed book had been passed down through generations.
meanings.sent4: The initialed necklace sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The initialed tree trunk bore the marks of many carvings.

meanings.definition: To write or mark with one's initials.
meanings.sent1: He initialed his initials on the bottom of the letter.
meanings.sent2: She initialed the gift tag with a flourish.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel initialed the tree trunk with its sharp claws.
meanings.sent4: The wind initialed the sand dunes with swirling patterns.
meanings.sent5: The artist initialed the painting in the corner discreetly.
